user_request.sanitized: Create a plan to update and fix the interactive terminal and the MCP integration: host-only GUI terminal, visible window for non-headless sends, approval except allowlist, identical behavior in local/container modes, and ability to send commands to existing instance.

requirements: Interactive terminal GUI always runs on host (never in container)
Non-headless command sends always open/show visible window
Approval required unless command on allowlist
Behavior identical in local and container modes
MCP tools can send commands to existing instance
constraints: Use dedicated headless tool for headless execution paths
No behavior divergence by runtime mode
